GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

queryDescriptions.author: Filter articles by the username of the author
queryDescriptions.sort_by: Sort articles by a valid column. Defaults to 'created_at'. Valid columns: article_id, title, author, body, topic, created_at, votes, comment_count
queryDescriptions.order: Specify 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending order. Defaults to 'desc'.

exampleQueries.description: Sort articles by created_at in ascending order
Sort articles by votes in descending order
Filter articles by the topic 'cats' and sort by votes in ascending order

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object by its id

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

404.description: Article not found for the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment for the specified article ID

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count of an article by article_id

requestBody.inc_votes: an integer that indicates how much the votes property should be updated by

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the given comment by comment_id

204.description: The comment was successfully deleted. No content is returned.

GET /api/users.description: Retrieves a list of all users from the database. Each user object contains the username, name, and avatar URL of the user.
